channel.title: Fixing '! /directory/ filename / extension is too long'
channel.description:
My issue was that whenever I tried extracting a file that had over 260 characters, the file wouldn't be created (Same for deleting a file as well) (for whatever reason) I've never had this issue before, and I'm not sure what caused it.
Fix: http://www.sevenforums.com/general-discussion/52235-filename-extension-too-long.html
Edit: Fixed it.
